title: Detour (1945, Film-Noir) directed by Edgar G. Ulmer | Starring Ann Savage & Tom Neal

sources.title: Detour (1945, Film-Noir) directed by Edgar G. Ulmer | Starring Ann Savage & Tom Neal
sources.description:
He went searching for love... but Fate forced a DETOUR to Revelry... Violence... Mystery!
Chance events trap  hitchhiking nightclub pianist Al Roberts in a tightening net of film noir trouble, including deception, blackmail and death.

Original title: Detour (1945)
This movie has dubbed Italian & Spanish audio, and subtitled in many more languages.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/rteEkq6qz1w


Director: Edgar G. Ulmer
Writers: Martin Goldsmith 
Genre: Colorized, Film Noir, Crime, Drama, Mystery & Suspense
Budget: $30,000

Main Cast: 
Tom Neal
Ann Savage
Claudia Drake
Edmund MacDonald
Tim Ryan
Esther Howard
Pat Gleason


00:00 Full colorized movie (with audio & subtitles).
02:01 Encounter between two strangers on a journey, one seeking company and conversation.
08:25 A couple's relationship is tested when one decides to pursue a career in Hollywood, causing tension and uncertainty.
15:51 Unpredictable encounters while hitchhiking lead to cautious conversations and shared experiences on a long journey.
20:56 A man recounts his misfortune in Miami and plans a lucrative return, driving through the night to reunite with his loved one.
28:41 Desperate for safety, the protagonist assumes a new identity to evade suspicion and reach his destination.
35:46 A man named Haskell encounters a woman named Vera on the road, leading to a mysterious and tense situation.
39:48 Partners plan to sell a car under a new name to avoid being traced, sharing profits equally.
45:33 Reflections on fate and mortality lead to boredom and anticipation of future plans.
51:47 Couple negotiates car sale, reaching a compromise after haggling over price and inspection.
56:49 A scheme involving an old man's death and a murder charge threat unfolds during a card game.
1:01:40 Intense confrontation between Vera and Roberts escalates, leading to threats and a struggle over the phone.


@CultCinemaClassics 

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
